channel.title: Summon PI
channel.description: Hey, i have summoning almost 100% But it doesnt attack other npc's :\ i have the BoB Inventory thing and everything i realllllyyyyy want to make so my summons can attack NPC's any ideas?

item.title: Summon PI
item.dc:creator: @FreePkServer FreePkServer
item.description:
